thread.title: Portland Timbers net 4-1 win over Colorado Rapids: Live recap
thread.title_full: Portland Timbers net 4-1 win over Colorado Rapids: Live recap | OregonLive.com

author: Molly Blue | The Oregonian/OregonLive
title: Portland Timbers net 4-1 win over Colorado Rapids: Live recap
text:
The Portland Timbers (15-11-8, 53 points) downed the Colorado Rapids (9-14-11, 37) 4-1 at Providence Park led by Darlington Nagbe, who scored two goals in the first half.
The Timbers could be looking at finishing with the No. 2 seed heading into the playoffs. Stick with us to confirm their finish and playoff opponent as games wrap up across the league.
Recap our live updates and play-by-play below.
Here's a look at the key moments of the game:
Final: Timbers 4, Rapids 1.
88th minute: Fanendo Adi scores, his 16th goal of the season, Timbers lead 4-1.
64th minute: Dairon Asprilla on for Lucas Melano .
63rd minute: Colorado with an own goal set up by a blast from Jorge Villafana . Timbers lead 3-1.
54th minute: Lucas Melano gets a yellow card .
48th minute: Diego Chara goes down to one knee and is looked at by training staff. He goes off, Jack Jewsbury comes on.
45 + 1: Alvas Powel l clears a ball heading toward goal that already was past Timbers goalkeeper Adam Kwarasey , preserves Portland's 2-1 halftime lead.
44th minute: Colorado's Lucas Pittanari gets a yellow card.
40th minute: Darlington Nagbe is taken down in a hard tackle by Powers, who is given a yellow card.
33rd minute: Darlington Nagbe heads home a cross from Lucas Melano to give the Timbers back the lead. Timbers lead 2-1.
13th minute: Colorado's Dominique Badji takes a shot from the top of the box that deflects off Timbers defender Liam Ridgewell and goes into the net. Game tied at 1-1.
5th minute: After getting taken down heading to goal, Darlington Nagbe fires a free kick from just outside the box into the net. Timbers lead 1-0.
Pregame information:
On the air : TV on ROOT Sports | Radio 750 The Game (KXTG 750AM, 102.9FM); La GranD (KGGD 93.5FM, 1150 AM).
-- Molly Blue
